en_title: Secretary for Justice to visit Shenzhen

en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, will visit Shenzhen tomorrow morning (July 9) to attend and speak at a law conference to commemorate the 20th anniversary of China's resumption of the exercise of sovereignty over Hong Kong.

The conference is organised by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Shenzhen University. Mr Yuen will speak on the implementation of the Basic Law at the opening ceremony. He will also deliver a speech at a panel session on opportunities and challenges for Hong Kong as a regional hub for legal services and dispute resolution services.
Mr Yuen will return to Hong Kong in the afternoon on the same day.
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師明日（七月九日）上午訪問深圳，出席「紀念香港回歸二十周年法律研討會」，並在會上發表演說。
研討會由外交部和深圳大學共同舉辦。袁國強將在研討會的開幕儀式上就《基本法》的落實致辭，並在其中一個環節以「香港建設『區域法律服務和糾紛解決中心』的機遇與挑戰」為題發表演說。
袁國強將於同日下午返回香港。
